meanings.definition: A large, impressive, or extravagant show or event.
meanings.sent1: The circus had a supershows with acrobats and clowns.
meanings.sent2: The music festival featured multiple supershows on the main stage.
meanings.sent3: The supershows at the fair drew huge crowds with their dazzling performances.
meanings.sent4: Her birthday party was a supershows of lights and decorations.
meanings.sent5: The supershows at the zoo amazed visitors with animal performances.

meanings.definition: To display or exhibit in a showy or impressive manner.
meanings.sent1: The artist will supershows his paintings at the gallery opening.
meanings.sent2: She likes to supershows her new jewelry collection at fashion events.
meanings.sent3: He decided to supershows his dance moves at the talent show.
meanings.sent4: The chef will supershows his culinary skills in the cooking competition.
meanings.sent5: The magician will supershows his tricks at the magic show.
